document: THE IMPACT OF THE GOVERNMENT POLICY ON THE DEVELOPMENT OF EDUCATION IN THE FIRST REPUBLIC OF KOREA, 1948-1966 by Byung Sook Choe B. D., Hankuk Theological Seminary, 1956 M. Ed., Miami University, 1941 Submitted to the Graduate Faculty in the School of Education in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy University of Pittsburgh 1971
